relation: Great for these types of students
The campus is pretty safe. I haven't had any scares in the past 3 years i've attended.
This school is great for students who are still undecided on a major.
The food is really good. The cafeteria was just remodeled and it looks spectacular.
If you plan to attend this school make do not wait til the last minute to pick your classes. Their classes tend to fill up fast and going through financial aid can be a headache.

I believe Saint Louis Community College is a great place to start your first year of college. The professors are excellent and you a given a ton of different options to recieve extra help. Also, many of the professors follow their syllabus completely given you the opportunity to know exactly what to expect.
pageTitle: Saint Louis Community College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex

textAfterTable: What to do for fun There are some great clubs ranging from Honors Society, to Student Nursing, and LGBT groups. Food and Dining Cafeteria's are average and provide what's needed. Dorm Life no dorms Academic Rigor Rigor varies from class to class, teacher-to-teacher, and campus. Tips for prospective students Work hard, be goal minded, and have a plan. In three sentences STLCC has a great selection of classes offered in online, hybrid, and 8-week format courses. When you enroll at one campus the classes offered at the others made available which will really open up your choices. It's a great place for affordable education for working adults. Login to rate or flag the reviews Natishah from Florissant, MO 01/13/2012 Reviewer is A current student here. 2 out of 2 people found this review useful. 2 of 91
